qmmm.help: Executes qmmm calculations for individual molecules and clusters

print_regions_pdb.help: print the geometry of the regions to a pdb file

max_iterations.help: max iterations for qmmm scf loop

job_file.help: name of jobfile to which jobs are written

io_states.help: states to write jobs for and which to parse from jobfile

regions.help: Definitions of all regions inside qmmmm

qmregion.help: qmregion with dft and optionally gwbse

state.help: initial state to track or ground state for dftcalculations

grid_for_potential.help: Grid to integrate influence of qm density om other regions

extgrid.help: grid on which the interaction with classical regions is compute

tolerance_energy.help: if energy difference for this region is below this value it is considered converged

tolerance_density.help: if RMS difference of density matrix is below this value it is considered converged

polarregion.help: polar region with polarisation dipoles and thole damping

tolerance_energy.help: if energy difference for this region is below this value it is considered converged

tolerance_dipole.help: if RMS difference of all dipoles in the is below this value it is considered converged
